name: I Am Brewing You Alive But You Can Leave At Any Time If You Really Want To
name_original: I Am Brewing You Alive But You Can Leave At Any Time If You Really Want To
description:
I found you passed out in the swamp so I brought you inside because you're the perfect ingredient for this evil potion for vampires and witches I'm making. But you have woken up and there's nothing restraining you from leaving. The fault is entirely mine. I didn't think ahead.

But I am lonely, and so fun to talk to. Won't you take a look around and see what I have to say? Maybe see my point of view?

The potion will be done in about two minutes! Look around as much as you would like until you're done cooking. Or just leave. It's up to you, really.

Made for the 2-Minute Horror Jam!
Character model by Rowan!
First Person Controller by Breogan!
Boil SFX by Milo!
Using Chalk-y Font!
Using Super Text Mesh!
Using the HPSXRP!
